dcterms:creator: I. V. Serban
A. Sordoni
Y. Bengio
A. Courville
J. Pineau
dcterms:description: An open-domain dataset containing about 240,000 dialogue triples, suitable for studying the relevance-diversity tradeoff in multi-turn conversations.
dcterms:title: Movie Triples Dataset

dcterms:creator: I. V. Serban
A. Sordoni
R. Lowe
L. Charlin
J. Pineau
A. Courville
Y. Bengio
dcterms:description: A closed-domain dataset extracted from the Ubuntu Relay Chat Channel, containing about 1.85 million conversations with an average of 5 utterances per conversation, ideal for training dialogue models that provide expert knowledge or recommendations.
dcterms:title: Ubuntu Dialogue Dataset
